mapper.delete: DELETE FROM itemMovement WHERE shop_seq = #{shopSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND shop_count = #{shopCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update: UPDATE itemMovement SET stock_move = #{stockMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE shop_seq = #{shopSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND shop_count = #{shopCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM itemMovement WHERE shop_seq = #{shopSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND shop_count = #{shopCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT * FROM itemMovementView WHERE shop_count = #{shopCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
